r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n: ### Fixed - Symfony HttpException with status less than 500 should not be considered an error #995, #1002 (thanks, @franek!) - Block Zend signals from background sender thread #1000 - Fix out-of-sync issue if span stack is closed while a closure is running #1001
